Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Bracelet
Description: Bracelet with a central spherical bead of light blue enamel. Symmetrically on either side, three rectangular tablets of mother-of-pearl, pierced at two extremities, have been included in the pattern, divided by two rows of disc-shaped beads of bone, sky blue enamel and black enamel. Corporal ornaments that include mother-of-pear tablets are typical of the C-Group, but the arrangement of the elements in this particular bracelet is quite original.
